TopicTitle: KAPAS - Kerbal Androgynous Peripheral Attach System (working!)

Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I want to tell you about KAPAS-75 - Kerbal Androgynous Peripheral Attach System-75. It is based on APAS-75. 'Androgynous' means that nodes are symmetrical, the same. This port can connect ships, but there are 3 problems:

1. Ships shakes when attached.

2. It doesn\'t work with time warp more than 2x.

3. After changing ships nodes can detach.

How to use:

1. Meet target craft.

2. Bring together the ships.

3. When bases of nodes touch each other, close the petals.

4. Change craft and close the petals.

If someone knows how to fix problems, please, tell me.

Screenshots(warning! Big pictures!):

WARNING! ONLY FOR 0.14!

Download:

http://www./?lc1xfm2wmlvzf64

So it\'s not a ugly docking system?

I like it. -dl-

Neat, docking clamp.

Does it come apart easily?
No, it has big strenth enough.
Nice!!! But can you make a 1m thing? I\'ve made a hole with 6 symmetry fuel tanks+engine. My goal is to get a small thing in it. But the base part can\'t attach underneath the command pod
1m? And make it upside down?

I just want it so I can attach it underneath the ship, like you mount fuel tanks under them command pod. But the grab part doesn\'t need to be changed.

And by the way, How to close the petals? with G

The part.cfg says something about default landing leg settings.

So I suppose this is just a modified lander leg (but in such a way that it can \'grab more efficient\').

So that would be G.
Yes, of course. Did you wait other settings?)
Good Work, hold on!
What about parachutes?
What do you mean exactly ?

What about parachutes?

I think he means that you cannot put a stock parachute on top :/
Yes stock chutes are a no go, however silisko\'s decoupler parachute will do the trick.
Or you can use Radial Mount Chute.
Nice...Real nice
If it works for 14.4, will it work for .15?
It should since it\'s just lander legs.

I tried docking with this system, it didn\'t work with me.

I got the parts to interlock and touch, then closed both the parts. But due to rotation of one of the craft they came loose again.

My craft just before docking:

Even with this, docking is not possible yet.

This is just like docking with lander legs: the meshes of the ships get entangled, which screws up the physics engine and throws both ships out of control.
[gmod]Post something constructive please.[/gmod]
Only for 0.14? Darn.

It should work for 0.16, because it's basically only redesigned landing legs. This doesn't provide real docking though. You can sort of dock (just like with landing legs), but the physics will pull you apart if you warp or switch ships, and there are many glitches.
How hard is it to not bump a 2 month old thread?

How hard is it to not bump a 2 month old thread?

Very hard for some *sigh* closed
